exploits.description: Attackers can intercept the initialization transaction to take control of the program authority before the legitimate admin.
exploits.attack_scenario: Attacker monitors mempool for initialize instructions and frontruns with their own authority.
exploits.secure_fix: Check if already initialized or use constant seeds for singleton state.
exploits.economic_impact: High: Complete loss of protocol ownership.

exploits.description: Swap logic fails to enforce k=xy constant product invariant, allowing liquidity extraction.
exploits.attack_scenario: Attacker performs multiple unbalanced swaps to drain specific pool reserves.
exploits.secure_fix: Enforce post-execution balance checks against the invariant.
exploits.economic_impact: Critical: Potential drainage of all pool assets.
